= Commercial Support =

Premium technical support via email is available at $250/incident.
If you prefer unlimited email support, we offer a subscription plan at $1,899 per 3-month. (Which is cheaper than 8-incident premium supports.)

We provide support at $45/hour for:
  * Developing or prototyping ZKGrails applications.
  * Implementing special features.
  * Creating custom builds.

Response time is no later than 2 business days. Contact: _zkgrails at gmail dot com_ for allocating time slots.
